head.supplied: ¶ [The Hon Secy read an extract from a letter addressed to Dr Leibius ¶ by Baron Von Mueller bearing upon the same subject ¶ and stating that Capt Pasco RN. and the Revd W. Potter had visited Sydne...

div.p: ML MSS 774/2, Miscellaneous papers of the Geographical Society of Australasia 1891-2, part 5, Antarctic Exploratory Expedition, Mitchell Library, State Library of New South Wales, Sydney.

[The Hon Secy read an extract from a letter addressed to Dr Leibius
Letter not found. The extract from M's letter was read at the meeting of the Royal Geographical Society of Australasia on 23 October 1891. by Baron Von Mueller bearing upon the same subject
i.e. raising funds for the Antarctic Exploring Expedition. and stating that Capt Pasco RN. and the Revd W. Potter had visited Sydney as delegates from Melbourne for the same purpose].
